about us

Perfect Lineis a continuously developing company that always pursues inno-vation; Perfect Line is a well-founded commercial establishment. "Perfect Line" is a strong commercial entity that was founded in 2014 and is based in the UAE launching base for the world providing all the products, accessories, and sports equipment required.

The company has selected trademarks and regional partners whose products align with international standards and speciﬁcations. That is to meet the needs of all who have those who have sports and athletic interests professionally and safely to ensure the To ensure highest of performance,

perfect line is certiﬁed with the high SOO9001 2015 to provide to all customers with best services that align with highest international standards & measures.

•Many years of work and challenges, and in that period it has been subjected to many difﬁculties, obstacles, and failures. We didn’t give up but worked hard. We do not doubt that success is near. By working together as one team Perfect Line will achieve a quantum leap in the world of supplying, selling products, Sports

equipment, and accessories according to modern methods following professional standards. With shared ideas and hard work, we will ensure fruitful outcomes for our customers and partners.

is the future

In the line of the vision of the Emirates which seeks toprogress and prosperity, and in light of the country of creativity and preference.

After a long study, Perfect Line has launched the brand for sports products. Its production lines will be for all products, supplies, accessories, and sports clothing for men, women, and children, for sports teams and individuals and team games. According to the highest international quality of the standards for all types of sports practitioners and in pursuit of excellence for the best products. The company has concluded agreements with many designers around the world to provide modern designs by a team of technicians and specialists to provide innovative products for athletes, and we aspire to become the No. 1 brand on the Arab and international levels.

Our Partners

"LISKI, Italy - An Italian company which has been operating in the market since the late 1970s and is active in many European countries and an ofﬁcial supplier of many championships and major events such as (World Cup for Football) (Russia) and the Italian, German and Spanish League and specializing in manufacturing training equipment needs, to ensure achieving the best performance while providing safe materials And distinctive, through wonderful compatibility between technology and athletes needs for the ﬁeldThe brand also provides, for example, match management tools, training equipment, protective platforms& many sports athletic products.

TELJU, Spanish- Spanish companies is a professional manufacturer and suppliers of high-quality sports equipment and devices, and has been working in this ﬁeld for more than 30 years and among its top clients are many government agencies, such as the Spanish Armed Forces and others such as hotels and large gyms.

Beltona, Netherlands- A Dutch company specializing in the manufacture and design of sportswear and sports accessories. The brand is worn by many Dutch and other clubs in other European countries and many major sports academies.

Our Partners

ATX / GYMFLOOR, Germany - A German company specialized in manufacturing, developing and designing equipment and also the equipping innovative ﬁtness halls according to the skills of German traditional engineering. This ﬁeld has been operating for more than 20 years and among its customers many German & European clubs, German medical rehabilitation centers, 5-star and 4-star hotels, and some of the clubs of other government agencies.

GYMNIC, Italy- An Italian company that designs and manufactures high-quality products to provide the perfect movement for people of all ages. It is a leading company in the ﬁelds of games, ﬁtness, and physiotherapy and has been operating for more than 20 years in this ﬁeld.
